metadata.title: CVE-2018-4114 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in certain Apple products. iOS before 11.3 isaffected. Safari before 11.1 is affected. iCloud before 7.4 on Windows isaffected. iTunes before 12.7.4 on Windows is affected. tvOS before 11.3 isaffected. watchOS before 4.3 is affected. The issue involves the "WebKit"component. It allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause adenial of service (memory corruption and application crash) via a craftedweb site.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-4114` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.20.0-2
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.1 - 2.20.0-2
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-6.0 - 2.20.0-2
gir1.2-webkit-6.0 - 2.20.0-2
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.20.0-2
gir1.2-webkit2-4.1 - 2.20.0-2
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.20.0-2
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.20.0-2
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.1-0 - 2.20.0-2
libjavascriptcoregtk-6.0-1 - 2.20.0-2
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.20.0-2
libwebkit2gtk-4.1-0 - 2.20.0-2
libwebkitgtk-6.0-4 - 2.20.0-2
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.20.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.20.0-2').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
